question: Which state has recently issued orders to limit the retail price of bottled drinking water?
explanation:
The state government of Kerala has issued an order to cap the retail price of bottled drinking water at Rs 13 per litre against the present price of Rs. 20 a litre.
The Price cut was achieved as the bottled water has been made an essential commodity. The civil supplies department issued the order and asked the manufacturers to follow the price limit and to print the new price in all bottles.
